mainContent.title: The Buckaroo Extension is successful installed

content.text: This is the official Buckaroo Magento 2 extension, version 1.14.0.

subHeading.title: Important information
subHeading.content: With this version the security of the configuration fields is improved. This means you have to fill in your Merchant and Secret key again in the configuration to activate Buckaroo.

subHeading.title: Configuration
subHeading.content: You can find the fields in the Magento Configuration. In the left menu click on Stores > Configuration > Sales > Buckaroo.

subHeading.title: Buckaroo Plaza
subHeading.content: In the Buckaroo Plaza https://plaza.buckaroo.nl the Merchant Key can be found under: My Buckaroo > Websites. The Secret Key can be found under: Configuration > Security > Secret Key.
